display_long_description:
You can now bring a Go/Baduk/Weiqi goban wherever you go, with ZenPlay. Immerse yourself in the strategic world of Go like never before with ZenPlay. Rediscover the ancient art of Go as you bring this captivating game to life on your tabletop.

* MIXED REALITY MODE BRINGS THE BOARD WHEREVER YOU GO
* PLAY IN 9X9, 13X13 OR 19X19 MODES
* SANDBOX MODE ALLOWS YOU TO PRACTICE JOSEKIS EASILY
* MULTIPLAYER LOBBIES WITH VOICE ENABLES NEW SOCIAL EXPERIENCE
* PLAY WITHOUT A CONTROLLER WITH HAND TRACKING
* CHOOSE FROM MULTIPLE ENVIRONMENTS
* AUTO-SCORING ASSISTS YOU WITH COUNTING STONES

With ZenPlay, experience the timeless gameplay of Go in a whole new dimension. Our app transforms any tabletop into a virtual Go board, allowing you to play with ease and precision.

Challenge friends, family, or players from around the world to engaging multiplayer matches. Explore the depths of strategic thinking as you delve into advanced tactics and learn from the wisdom of Go masters. Whether you're a seasoned player or new to the game, ZenPlay offers a user-friendly platform to refine your skills and deepen your appreciation for this ancient game.

Unleash your inner tactician and embrace the harmonious blend of tradition and modernity with ZenPlay. It's time to embark on a journey of strategic enlightenment right on your tabletop. Are you ready to play?
